reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 5 year old loves it
reviews.reviewText: Super loud all the kids love it. The bottom broke off or slides down but it still works

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my kids. They have a lot of fun with it. It’s loud and obnoxious but they sure enjoy it! Seems to be of good quality so far and easy to operate.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars My daughter loves this!!
reviews.reviewText: My 2 year old daughter is always singing songs so we thought we would get this as her Christmas present. She loves singing on this and it is pretty loud so we can easily hear it. She is easily able to turn it on herself. The microphone top is not very strong as it fell off after a week. Luckily we have gorilla glue at home so we were easily able to glue it together. The other downside is sometimes her voice is not clear but we can fix that by turning it off and on. However, for the price and the fact is encourages her to sing, we are happy with it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It never would turn on-Item replaced
reviews.reviewText: I bought this my for 2 year old granddaughter for Christmas. I ordered in early October. When I was trying to charge it up so she would have it Christmas Day, it won’t turn on. It’s outside the return window so I’m stuck with a green microphone that doesn’t work.1/4/24 update: There was an email address inside this box to contact for any issues. I emailed them and they responded quickly and replaced the broken microphone with a new one. My granddaughter loves it! It didn't make it for Christmas but I was happy with the customer service.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's a hit
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Bluetooth Wireless Karaoke Machine as a gift for my 10-year-old daughter, and it turned out to be an absolute hit! This is a fantastic present for kids aged 6-15, and it's sure to bring hours of fun and entertainment.Firstly, the rose gold color and sleek design make it visually appealing. It's not just a toy; it's a stylish accessory that kids will love to show off to their friends.The Bluetooth connectivity is a game-changer. It's incredibly easy to pair with a smartphone or tablet, allowing kids to sing along to their favorite songs from streaming platforms. The sound quality is surprisingly good, and the adjustable volume ensures it's suitable for different settings.The karaoke machine also comes with LED lights that add a party vibe to any performance. Kids love the flashy lights, and it makes karaoke even more exciting.As a parent, I appreciate that it's not just about singing – it can also serve as a portable speaker for music playback. The rechargeable battery is a plus, ensuring it's always ready for action.Overall, the Bluetooth Wireless Karaoke Machine is a versatile and enjoyable gift for kids. It encourages creativity, social interaction, and lots of laughter. I highly recommend it as a present for any child aged 6-15, and it's available in a stylish rose gold color that's sure to be a hit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: While she absolutely loved it and it worked great. . . It stopped after 3 weeks. . . She was heartbroken.Bluetooth, sounds, voices all of it was amazing and she had so much fun with it. Just wish it had lasted longer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We have laughed and laughed at the voice changing effects. Fun microphone for any age.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Can’t get it to work
reviews.reviewText: Edit to add: we exchanged the microphone. Unfortunately we had to pay extra to return it, but it is what it is. New microphone works great!Can’t get it to work. Out of the box, it sounds like something is rolling around inside the speaker. The light turns on but does nothing after that. Very disappointing, this was a Christmas present for my kiddo.

reviews.reviewTitle: Muy bien recibido por una niña de tres años
reviews.reviewText: Fabuloso!!! La bebé de tres años encantada con su regalo!!!
Se realizó la carga del micrófono, empezó a oler quemado,no funcionó, no lo recomiendo
Mami hija no lo deja por nada

reviews.reviewTitle: Cheap looking packaging. Bad idea as a gift
reviews.reviewText: Not sure if it works as I bought it as a gift to my niece. It came in a cheap looking cardboard box, no branding, one measly looking piece of paper thats the manual. You can probably buy for your own kids but not as a gift.
